Мод написан для ответственных родителей-римворлдистов.
=====
Что делает мод:
Этот простой xml-мод отключает самые жёсткие аспекты, чтобы дети от 7 лет могли играть в Римворлд, не получая психологических травм. Подробности в файле changelog.
Проверено на Римворлде v1.2.2753 rev.705 с официальным русским переводом от 15.09.2020. Текущая версия 7plus мода: v0.3.0beta rev.2020.09.30.
=====
Совместимость:
Целью является сделать играбельными моды типа этих: modpack http://lttlword.ru/rimworld-minimalism-v1-1 modpack http://lttlword.ru/rimworld-sborka-modov-ot-lalks-i-pal multiplayer https://rimworldmultiplayer.com/post/20_04_17_royalty/
Несовместим с модами "Psychology", "Rational Romance" и другими, меняющими отношения между полами. Пока несовместим с модами на новые расы, животных, кухонные верстаки. Но если будут желающие, я добавлю совместимость, пишите. Несовместим с модом Numbers. Ужасно жаль, я работаю над этим.
=====
Порядок модов:
Обычно располагаю 7plus в конце списка.
=====
Новая игра:
Желательна, но необязательна - в этом случае надо вручную удалить нежелательные трейты из файла changelog. В интернете куча видео-инструкций, поищите строку "Rimworld удалить trait". Только будьте внимательны, тщательно удалите из файла сохранения все 6 нежелательных трейтов, и удалите все старые сохранения.

7plus mod for Rimworld. Sorry for my English, i compiled this file for multilingual families.
"Dedicated to all parents playing Rimworld"
- Uncle_Shvya
=====
What The Mod Does:
This simple xml mod turns off the most hardcore aspects in order to allow 7+ aged children play Rimworld, without getting psychological trauma. For details, see changelog file.
Tested with game v1.2.2753 rev.705 with official russian traslation v.2020-sep-15. Current 7plus mod version 0.2.6а rev.2020.09.19.
=====
Compatibility:
The aim was to make such mods playable: modpack http://lttlword.ru/rimworld-minimalism-v1-1 modpack http://lttlword.ru/rimworld-sborka-modov-ot-lalks-i-pal multiplayer https://rimworldmultiplayer.com/post/20_04_17_royalty/
This mod is not compatible with "Psychology", "Rational Romance" or any other mods altering RimWorld's romance systems. Version 0.2.6a (and older one) is incompatible with mods for new races.
=====
How to install: folders "7plus" and "18plus" copy into "Mods" folder, and all from "texts" move to proper "Data\Core\Languages\Russian\" and "Data\Royalty\Languages\Russian\" folders, overwrite files. If you are updating new version of 7plus mod, first delete old mod folders.
=====
Order:
Usually i move 7plus mod to the end of list.
=====
New game:
It's better to start a new game. However, old games are playable too. You should manually delete unwanted traits (see changelog file). There are a lot of video lessons in www, search the string "Rimworld delete trait".
=====
Known errors:
- 3 red errors after game launch. These are about pyromaniacs. Mean that they won't generate automatically. Just ignore. - 24 yellow translation errors. These are about removed traits. Just ignore. - When the games tries to generate pawn with removed trait, for example, during starting new game or calculating Raid incident, you can see 3 red errors per pawn. Just ignore. Cheaters, stop use the pawn rerolling too much! ;) - Sometimes starting new game, you see just few towns. Restart game with another seed, it's a very rare error. - For compilation of the alpha version, Humans were temporarily transformed into a mechanical race. Cons: you cannot start new game just clicking the button. Other humanoids except the initial ones will almost not appear. People can't be healed. Pros: no debuff from wet clothes, no bleeding, no rotting bodies. - Let your kids learn the basic mechanics of the game, while I finish the mod. Battles will be anyway. New game bug - the easiest solution is to start game with 18plus mod, save. Then run 7plus mod instead and load the game. Healing bug - you can bypass it via "save-load" or installing surgery mods. Or more easily - choose developer mode - open debug actions tool - see group "Tools-Pawns" - button "T: Remove Hediff" - click the wounded pawn - choose wounds to delete. - While humanoids are mechanical, the "Social" button is usually hidden. This button is not extremely nessesary. - While humanoids are mechanical, the "Wedding" ceremony cannot finish automatically. The solution is to save game, load with 18plus mod. When the ceremony finished, restart game with 7plus mod. - While humanoids are a mechanical, prisoner capture has become much more difficult. If you can't do it at all, write me for a hint. - While humanoids are a mechanical, prisoner escape is a problem. There are some solutions for those who are interested. - Rare bug, red errors when people are trying to communicate with a certain pawn. The probable cause is the loss of consciousness he/she experienced, or mission outside the settlement. I solved this way - load game with the only 18plus mod, waited for the colonist to communicate, and switched back to the 7 plus mod. - Rare bug, when u save game during a party, loading this saved game will cause a red error. Just ignore.
During network game with Zetrith's Multiplayer mod: - Desync after healing via developer mode. The solution is to reconnect the client.
=====
In fact, v0.2.6a changes the lore as follows: colonists land on a habitable, but unpopulated planet. Since this is a strongly possible situation in the universe of 6th millennium, I've created a scenario for this occasion. To use it, copy the Scenarios folder from the mod distribution to savefolder. It can be opened from main menu - Options - Open save data folder.
